00039 RT_Test* doRefRun();

00042 string m_celsSuffix = ".CEL";

00055 ///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00056 int main(int argc, char* argv[])
00057 {
00058   if( !Fs::dirExists("test-generated" ) ){
00059     Fs::mkdir("test-generated", false);
00060   }
00061 
00062   RT_Main* rMain = new RT_Main("apt-rt-dmet-genotype");
00063 
00064  //Store names of tests for Help Message
00065  //Store it in our RT_Main Instance
00066  std::vector<std::string> testNameList;
00067  testNameList.push_back("doRefBuild");
00068  testNameList.push_back("doRefRun");
00069  testNameList.push_back("doPlasmidRun");
00070  rMain->setTestNameList(testNameList);
00071 
00072  //Set Variables
00073  rMain->setVar("sdktop", "../..");
00074  rMain->setVar("celsuffix", ".CEL");
00075  rMain->setVar("gold_lib_dmetplus", "${gold_dir}/lib/DMET_Plus");
00076  rMain->setVar("gold_dmetgenotype_dmetplus", "${gold_dir}/dmet-genotype/DMET_Plus");
00077  rMain->setVar("gold_dmetgenotype_dmetplus_testname_chp", "${gold_dmetgenotype_dmetplus}/${testname}/chp");
00078  rMain->setVar("out_testname_chp", "${out_testname}/chp");
00079  rMain->setVar("dmetchpsuffix", ".dmet.chp");
00080 
00081  if(argc < 1)
00082    {
00083      cout<<"Error: Incorrect number of arguments given"<<endl;
00084      exit(1);
00085    }
00086  //They want us to run all default tests
00087  else if(argc == 1)
00088    {
00089      rMain->addTest(doRefBuild());
00090      rMain->addTest(doRefRun());
00091      rMain->addTest(doPlasmidRun());
00092    }
00093  else
00094    {
00095      rMain->parseArgv(argc, argv);
00096 
00097      cout<<"Running Built-In Regression Tests"<<endl;
00098      if(rMain->getVarVal("doRefBuild") != "")
00099        {
00100          rMain->addTest(doRefBuild());
00101        }
00102      if(rMain->getVarVal("doRefRun") != "")
00103        {
00104          rMain->addTest(doRefRun());
00105        }
00106      if(rMain->getVarVal("doPlasmidRun") != "")
00107        {
00108          rMain->addTest(doPlasmidRun());
00109        }
00110 
00111    }
00112  rMain->runTests();
00113 }

00115 ///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00116 RT_Test* doRefBuild()
00117 {
00118   RT_Test* rt;
00119   rt = new RT_Test("doRefBuild");
00120 
00121   RT_Cmd* cmd = rt->newCmd();
00122   cmd->setExe("${apt_dmet_genotype}");
00123   cmd->addArg("--batch-info=true");
00124   cmd->addArg("--null-context=false");
00125   cmd->addArg("--reference-input=${gold_lib_dmetplus}/DMET_Plus.r3.genomic.ref.a5");
00126   cmd->addArg("--out-dir=${out_testname}");
00127   cmd->addArg("--cel-files=${gold_dmetgenotype_dmetplus}/cels.small.txt");
00128   cmd->addArg("--cdf-file=${gold_lib_dmetplus}/DMET_Plus.r3.cdf");
00129   cmd->addArg("--chrX-probes=${gold_lib_dmetplus}/DMET_Plus.r3.chrXprobes");
00130   cmd->addArg("--chrY-probes=${gold_lib_dmetplus}/DMET_Plus.r3.chrYprobes");
00131   cmd->addArg("--batch-name=dynamic-batch-1");
00132   cmd->addArg("--reference-output=${out_testname}/reference.a5");
00133   cmd->addArg("--region-model=${gold_lib_dmetplus}/DMET_Plus.r3.cn-region-models.txt");
00134   cmd->addArg("--probeset-model=${gold_lib_dmetplus}/DMET_Plus.r3.cn-probeset-models.txt");
00135   cmd->addArg("--probeset-ids=${gold_lib_dmetplus}/DMET_Plus.r3.genomic.gt.ps");
00136   cmd->addArg("--probeset-ids-reported=${gold_dmetgenotype_dmetplus}/consent1.txt");
00137   cmd->addArg("--cn-region-gt-probeset-file=${gold_lib_dmetplus}/DMET_Plus.r3.cn-gt.ps");
00138   cmd->addArg("--cc-chp-output=true");
00139   cmd->addArg("--");
00140   cmd->addArg("--summaries=true");
00141   cmd->addArg("--feat-effects");
00142   cmd->addArg("--");
00143   cmd->addArg("--text-output");
00144   cmd->addArg("--");
00145   cmd->addArg("--table-output");
00146   cmd->addArg("--feat-effects");
00147   cmd->addArg("--summaries");
00148 
00149   vector<string> gold,gen;
00150   gold = Util::addPrefixSuffix(m_cels, "${gold_dmetgenotype_dmetplus_testname_chp}/", "${dmetchpsuffix}");
00151   gen = Util::addPrefixSuffix(m_cels, "${out_testname_chp}/", "${dmetchpsuffix}");
00152 
00153   RT_Check* check = rt->newCheck();
00154   check->setExe("${apt_check_calvinchp}");
00155   check->setGenFiles(gen);
00156   check->setGoldFiles(gold);
00157   /*
00158   //Calvin Chp Check
00159   rt->addCheckMult("${apt_check_calvinchp}", gen, gold);
00160   */
00161   return rt;
00162 }

00164 ///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00165 RT_Test* doRefRun()
00166 {
00167   RT_Test* rt;
00168   rt = new RT_Test("doRefRun");
00169   
00170   RT_Cmd* cmd = rt->newCmd();
00171   cmd->setExe("${apt_dmet_genotype}");
00172   cmd->addArg("--batch-info=false");
00173   cmd->addArg("--null-context=true");
00174   cmd->addArg("--reference-input=${gold_lib_dmetplus}/DMET_Plus.r3.genomic.ref.a5");
00175   cmd->addArg("--out-dir=${out_testname}");
00176   cmd->addArg("--cel-files=${gold_dmetgenotype_dmetplus}/cels.small.txt");
00177   cmd->addArg("--spf-file=${gold_lib_dmetplus}/DMET_Plus.r3.spf");
00178   cmd->addArg("--chrX-probes=${gold_lib_dmetplus}/DMET_Plus.r3.chrXprobes");
00179   cmd->addArg("--chrY-probes=${gold_lib_dmetplus}/DMET_Plus.r3.chrYprobes");
00180   cmd->addArg("--region-model=${gold_lib_dmetplus}/DMET_Plus.r3.cn-region-models.txt");
00181   cmd->addArg("--probeset-model=${gold_lib_dmetplus}/DMET_Plus.r3.cn-probeset-models.txt");
00182   cmd->addArg("--probeset-ids=${gold_lib_dmetplus}/DMET_Plus.r3.genomic.gt.ps");
00183   cmd->addArg("--probeset-ids-reported=${gold_dmetgenotype_dmetplus}/consent2.txt");
00184   cmd->addArg("--cn-region-gt-probeset-file=${gold_lib_dmetplus}/DMET_Plus.r3.cn-gt.ps");
00185   cmd->addArg("--cc-chp-output=true");
00186   cmd->addArg("--geno-call-thresh=0.01");
00187   cmd->addArg("--");
00188   cmd->addArg("--summaries=true");
00189   cmd->addArg("--feat-effects");
00190   cmd->addArg("--");
00191   cmd->addArg("--text-output");
00192   cmd->addArg("--");
00193   cmd->addArg("--table-output");
00194   cmd->addArg("--feat-effects");
00195   cmd->addArg("--summaries");
00196 
00197   vector<string> gold,gen;
00198   gold = Util::addPrefixSuffix(m_cels, "${gold_dmetgenotype_dmetplus_testname_chp}/", "${dmetchpsuffix}");
00199   gen = Util::addPrefixSuffix(m_cels, "${out_testname_chp}/", "${dmetchpsuffix}");
00200 
00201   //Calvin Chp Check
00202   RT_Check* check = rt->newCheck();
00203   check->setExe("${apt_check_calvinchp}");
00204   check->setGenFiles(gen);
00205   check->setGoldFiles(gold);
00206 
00207   // rt->addCheckMult("${apt_check_calvinchp}", gen, gold);
00208 
00209   return rt;
00210 }

00212 ///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00213 RT_Test* doPlasmidRun()
00214 {
00215   RT_Test* rt;
00216   rt = new RT_Test("doPlasmidRun");
00217 
00218   RT_Cmd* cmd = rt->newCmd();
00219   cmd->setExe("${apt_dmet_genotype}");
00220   cmd->addArg("--reference-input=${gold_lib_dmetplus}/DMET_Plus.r3.plasmid.ref.a5");
00221   cmd->addArg("--out-dir=${out_testname}");
00222   cmd->addArg("--cel-files=${gold_dmetgenotype_dmetplus}/cels.small.txt");
00223   cmd->addArg("--cdf-file=${gold_lib_dmetplus}/DMET_Plus.r3.cdf");
00224   cmd->addArg("--chrX-probes=${gold_lib_dmetplus}/DMET_Plus.r3.chrXprobes");
00225   cmd->addArg("--chrY-probes=${gold_lib_dmetplus}/DMET_Plus.r3.chrYprobes");
00226   cmd->addArg("--region-model=${gold_lib_dmetplus}/DMET_Plus.r3.cn-region-models.txt");
00227   cmd->addArg("--probeset-ids=${gold_lib_dmetplus}/DMET_Plus.r3.plasmid.gt.ps");
00228   cmd->addArg("--probeset-ids-reported=${gold_lib_dmetplus}/DMET_Plus.r3.plasmid.gt.ps");
00229   cmd->addArg("--cc-chp-output=true");
00230   cmd->addArg("--geno-call-thresh=0.2");
00231   cmd->addArg("--run-cn-engine=false");
00232   //cmd->addArg("--run-cn-engine=false");
00233 
00234   vector<string> gold,gen;
00235   gold = Util::addPrefixSuffix(m_cels, "${gold_dmetgenotype_dmetplus_testname_chp}/", "${dmetchpsuffix}");
00236   gen = Util::addPrefixSuffix(m_cels, "${out_testname_chp}/", "${dmetchpsuffix}");
00237   
00238   //Calvin Chp Check
00239   RT_Check* check = rt->newCheck();
00240   check->setExe("${apt_check_calvinchp}");
00241   check->setGenFiles(gen);
00242   check->setGoldFiles(gold);
00243 
00244   //  rt->addCheckMult("${apt_check_calvinchp}", gen, gold);
00245 
00246   return rt;
00247 }
